gmail.name: Gmail
gmail.description: Use your Gmail account with App Password

outlook.name: Outlook / Microsoft 365
outlook.description: Use your Outlook or Microsoft 365 account

gmail.passwordTip: Save this app password in a safe place - you can only see it once!

enableTwoFactor.title: 1. Enable two-factor authentication
enableTwoFactor.description: Go to your Google account security page and enable 2-step verification if not already enabled.

generateAppPassword.title: 2. Create an App Password
generateAppPassword.description: Go to App Passwords (requires 2-step verification), select "Mail" and your device, and click "Generate".

copyPassword.title: 3. Copy your App Password
copyPassword.description: Google will show a 16-character password. Copy this and use it as your password in Nory instead of your regular Google password.

signIn.title: 1. SMTP settings
signIn.description: Outlook/Microsoft 365 uses the SMTP server smtp.office365.com on port 587 with TLS encryption.

useEmailAsUsername.title: 2. Use your email as username
useEmailAsUsername.description: Enter your full email address (e.g. your@outlook.com or your@company.com) as username.

useRegularPassword.title: 3. Use your password
useRegularPassword.description: Use your regular Outlook/Microsoft password. If you use two-factor authentication, you may need to create an app password.

custom.title: Custom SMTP server
custom.description: Enter your SMTP server details manually. Contact your email provider for the correct settings.
custom.smtpPort: Port number (typically 587 for TLS or 465 for SSL)

serviceAccountGuide.title: How to get your key file
serviceAccountGuide.helpButton: How do I get the key file?
serviceAccountGuide.shareTip: Important: Copy the service account email (ending in @...iam.gserviceaccount.com) and share your Google Drive folder with this email. Give it "Editor" access.

createProject.title: 1. Create a Google Cloud project
createProject.description: Go to Google Cloud Console and create a new project. Give it a recognizable name, e.g. "Nory Backup".

enableApi.title: 2. Enable Google Drive API
enableApi.description: Search for "Google Drive API" in the API library and click "Enable" to allow your project to use Google Drive.

createServiceAccount.title: 3. Create a service account
createServiceAccount.description: Go to "IAM & Admin" → "Service Accounts" and click "Create Service Account". Give it a name and skip the roles.

createKey.title: 4. Create a key
createKey.description: Click on your new service account, go to the "Keys" tab, click "Add Key" → "Create new key" and select JSON format.

downloadKey.title: 5. Download the key file
downloadKey.description: The JSON file downloads automatically. This file is your key - store it securely and upload it here in Nory.

shareFolder.title: 6. Share your Drive folder
shareFolder.description: Create a folder in Google Drive for backups. Right-click → "Share" and add the service account email with "Editor" access.
